content.article_body: LAHORE, Aug 02 (APP): Iran's President Dr Masoud Pezeshkian arrived in the provincial capital, here on Saturday. Punjab Chief Minister Maryam Nawaz, PML-N President Mian Nawaz Sharif, Punjab Senior Minister Marriyum Aurangzeb and others received the Iranian president at Lahore airport. The Iranian president is on two-day official visit to Pakistan, and this is his first visit. After arrival, the president left for Mazar-e-Iqbal to pay his respects to Allama Dr Muhammad Iqbal, the Poet of the East.
